original_text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force, to make him a king, he departed again into a mountain himself alone.
korean_text: 그러므로 예수께서 그들이 와서 자기를 억지로 붙들어 임금으로 삼으려는 줄 아시고 다시 혼자 산으로 떠나 가시니라

sentences.original_text: that they would come and take him by force
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 와서 그를 억지로 붙잡으려 한다는 것을

sentences.original_text: he departed again into a mountain
